info.description:
# Purpose

The purpose of the Measurement API is to handle measurement data.

# Examples

For a more in-depth description, and examples, of usage of the various endpoints please refer to the [service description](/docs/service).
info.title: Measurement API

get.summary: Get last collected time (in RFC3339) and measurement count for a list of assets

parameters.description: What data to include, formatted as a comma-separated string
parameters.name: include-only

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.
The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description:
API call to fetch asset data measurements. The result can be limited to a from/to date and an offset and
limit. Also specific content types can be filtered out. The result is returned as a list of measurements
asset data, with the most recent asset data returned first in the list.
get.summary: Fetch Asset Data with date limits

parameters.description: filter results by tag, to look for tag 'foo' with value 'bar': ?tags[foo]=bar
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: filter to return data after a given date
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: filter to return data before a given date
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: limits the amount of returned data
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: filter to only return data of the provided content type. Available types: 'DATA_POINT', 'NOTE', 'QUESTION_ANSWERS', 'SPECTRUM', 'TIME_SERIES', 'MISSING_VALUE'
parameters.name: content_type

parameters.description: When true, return only resurrectable measurements previously deleted
parameters.name: resurrectable

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.summary: Fetch all media on nodes beneath a given asset

parameters.description: filter results by tags, to look for tag 'foo' with value 'bar': ?tags[foo]=bar
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: filter to return data after a given date
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: filter to return data before a given date
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: When true, returns pixel width, pixel height and the ratio of the images
parameters.name: dimensions

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

post.description: More detailed information on this endpoint and response data is available [here](/docs/service/assets-search).
post.summary: This endpoint can be used to retrieve metadata on a list of asset IDs

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

parameters.description: only return events after a sequence no
parameters.name: after_seq_no

parameters.description: limits the amount of returned events
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: sort the result ascending or descending
parameters.name: sort

get.description: This endpoint is used to fetched a completed export. It will return a signed S3 URL that can be used to download the export file. The user calling this endpoint needs permission to get exports on the hierarchy node which the export was started on.

parameters.description: The ID of the export for which to retrieve a URL
parameters.name: exportId

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

425.description: This error is returned if the requested export is not in a completed state.

get.description: This endpoint is called to retrieve the status of an export. The user calling this endpoint needs permission to get export status on the hierarchy node which the export was started on.
get.summary: Fetch the status of an export

parameters.description: The ID of the export for which to check status
parameters.name: exportId

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

post.description: This is endpoint is used to start an export of measurements. The API supports exporting from a company, site, or asset node. If a company node is exported, measurements on all nodes in the subtree of the company will be included. Further filtering can be applied when creating the export, e.g. by only choosing to export certain types of measurements.

parameters.description: The hierarchy node ID of the node that should be exported
parameters.name: nodeId

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

429.description: This error will be returned when there is any export currently in any running state (e.g. pending).

get.description: API call to fetch a measurement point for a node ID. The measurement point contains information about e.g. when a measurement for the given node ID was collected and how many times measurements have been collected.

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

parameters.description: Rules apply to measurements with content type MISSING_VALUE, see description of tags. Additional information on the inputs can be found at [the service documentation](/docs/service)
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: When true, return predicted measurement IDs. Not applicable on media. Disclaimer: Because they are predicted, an ID that will never be created might be returned, if, for example, the measurement already exists.
parameters.name: verbose

parameters.description: When true, return only resurrectable measurements previously deleted
parameters.name: resurrectable

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description: API call to fetch node data measurement. The result is returned as a measurement node data.
get.summary: Fetch Node Data for specified measurement

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

put.description: API call to update node data measurement.
put.summary: Update Node Data for specified measurement

parameters.description: When true, resurrect a soft-deleted measurement
parameters.name: resurrect

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

delete.description: API call to delete a measurement.

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description: API call to fetch overall band value. The result is returned with the measurement's creation date
get.summary: Fetch overall band value for specified Spectrum measurement

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description: API call to fetch overall band value for all spectrum measurements under the given node. The result is returned with each measurement's creation date.
get.summary: Fetch overall band value for all spectrum measurements under given node

parameters.description: filter to return data after a given date
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: filter to return data before a given date
parameters.name: to

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.summary: Get last collected time in RFC3339 for asset node

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.summary: Fetch all media for a given node

parameters.description: filter results by tags, to look for tag 'foo' with value 'bar': ?tags[foo]=bar
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: filter to return data after a given date
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: filter to return data before a given date
parameters.name: to

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

put.description: Request a pre-signed URL to upload media files to. This is mainly used for larger files
put.summary: Fetch signed media upload URL for a given node

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

200.description: The content of the media file being downloaded

Cache-Control.description: Specifies how long the client can cache the returned media file

Content-Length.description: The size of the media file

Content-Type.description: The MIME type of the media file

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.
The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description:
API call to fetch node data measurements. The result can be limited to a from/to date and an offset and
limit. Also specific content types can be filtered out. The result is returned as a list of measurements
node data, with the most recent node data returned first in the list.
get.summary: Fetch Node Data with date limits

parameters.description: filter results by tag, to look for tag 'foo' with value 'bar': ?tags[foo]=bar
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: filter to return data after a given date
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: filter to return data before a given date
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: limits the amount of returned data
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: filter to only return data of the provided content type. Available types: 'DATA_POINT', 'NOTE', 'QUESTION_ANSWERS', 'SPECTRUM', 'TIME_SERIES', 'MISSING_VALUE'
parameters.name: content_type

parameters.description: When true, return only resurrectable measurements previously deleted
parameters.name: resurrectable

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

get.description: API call to fetch the usage counters for a node ID. The number of counters returned can be limited with the limit query parameter.
get.summary: Retrieve the usage counter for a node

403.description: The request to access the resource was denied.

xUnit.description: XUnit describes the X unit, such as a ms (millisecond)

yUnit.description: YUnit describes the Y unit, such as acceleration enveloping peak-to-peak (gE PtP), mm/s (millimeters per second), in/s (inch per second), Celsius (C) or Fahrenheit (F)

id.description: This is the ID of the media file

tags.description: Tags is a JSON object encoded as a string

A reason tag has to be included for measurements with content type MISSING_VALUE, it can be any string but
recommended values are unsafe_access, guarding_hazard, rotating_component_exposed, como_system_malfunction,
not_operating, under_maintenance, out_of_operating_regime, in_standby, no_operator_to_start_equipment,
no_reason_set, not_monitored or out_of_service

contentType.description: The media content type, the valid values are UNKNOWN, AUDIO_WAV, IMAGE_JPEG, IMAGE_PNG, AUDIO_MP4

id.description: The ID of the media, the value needs to be a valid UUID

xUnit.description: XUnit describes the X unit, such as a ms (millisecond) or a s (second)

yUnit.description: YUnit describes the Y unit, such as acceleration enveloping (gE), mm/s (millimeters per second) or in/s (inch per second)

xUnit.description: XUnit describes the X unit, such as a ms (millisecond) or a s (second)

yUnit.description: YUnit describes the Y unit, such as acceleration enveloping (gE), mm/s (millimeters per second) or in/s (inch per second)

correlationId.description: CorrelationID, an unique identifier for tracing this issue in server logs.

detail.description: Detail, a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Instance, a URI reference that identifies the specific resource on which the problem occurred.

status.description: Status, the HTTP status code associated with this problem occurrence.

title.description:
Title, a short, human-readable summary of the problem type.
This should always be the same value for the same Type.

type.description:
Type, a URI reference that identifies the problem type.
When dereferenced this should provide human-readable documentation for the
problem type. When member is not present it is assumed to be "about:blank".
